pages.name: page1
pages.title: Job Satisfaction

elements.name: job_satisfaction
elements.title: How satisfied are you with your current job?
elements.description: Rate your overall job satisfaction.

elements.name: work_life_balance
elements.title: How would you rate your work-life balance?
elements.description: Rate your satisfaction with your work-life balance.

elements.name: job_role_satisfaction
elements.title: How satisfied are you with your job role?
elements.description: Select your level of satisfaction with your job role.

elements.name: recommend_company
elements.title: Would you recommend this company to a friend?
elements.description: Indicate whether you would recommend this company to a friend.

elements.name: improvement_suggestions
elements.title: Do you have any suggestions for improving job satisfaction?
elements.description: Provide any suggestions you have for improving job satisfaction.

pages.description: Questions about your overall job satisfaction.

elements.name: work_environment
elements.title: How would you rate your work environment?
elements.description: Rate your satisfaction with your work environment.

elements.name: equipment_quality
elements.title: How would you rate the quality of the equipment you use?
elements.description: Rate your satisfaction with the quality of the equipment provided.

elements.name: workplace_safety
elements.title: How safe do you feel in your workplace?
elements.description: Select your level of safety in the workplace.

elements.name: sufficient_resources
elements.title: Do you have sufficient resources to do your job effectively?
elements.description: Indicate whether you have sufficient resources to perform your job effectively.

elements.name: environment_improvements
elements.title: Do you have any suggestions for improving the work environment?
elements.description: Provide any suggestions you have for improving the work environment.

elements.name: management_support
elements.title: How would you rate the support you receive from management?
elements.description: Rate your satisfaction with the support provided by management.

elements.name: leadership_effectiveness
elements.title: How would you rate the effectiveness of the leadership team?
elements.description: Rate your satisfaction with the effectiveness of the leadership team.

elements.name: communication_clarity
elements.title: How clear is the communication from management?
elements.description: Select your level of satisfaction with the clarity of communication from management.

elements.name: management_approachable
elements.title: Is management approachable and open to feedback?
elements.description: Indicate whether management is approachable and open to feedback.

elements.name: leadership_improvements
elements.title: Do you have any suggestions for improving management and leadership?
elements.description: Provide any suggestions you have for improving management and leadership.

elements.name: training_opportunities
elements.title: How would you rate the training opportunities available to you?
elements.description: Rate your satisfaction with the training opportunities provided.

elements.name: career_growth
elements.title: How would you rate the opportunities for career growth?
elements.description: Rate your satisfaction with the opportunities for career growth.

elements.name: skill_development
elements.title: How satisfied are you with the skill development programs?
elements.description: Select your level of satisfaction with the skill development programs.

elements.name: mentorship_programs
elements.title: Are mentorship programs available and effective?
elements.description: Indicate whether mentorship programs are available and effective.

elements.name: development_improvements
elements.title: Do you have any suggestions for improving professional development opportunities?
elements.description: Provide any suggestions you have for improving professional development opportunities.

elements.name: company_values
elements.title: How well do the company's values align with your personal values?
elements.description: Rate the alignment of the company's values with your personal values.

elements.name: team_collaboration
elements.title: How would you rate the level of collaboration within your team?
elements.description: Rate your satisfaction with the level of collaboration within your team.

elements.name: diversity_inclusion
elements.title: How satisfied are you with the company's efforts towards diversity and inclusion?
elements.description: Select your level of satisfaction with the company's efforts towards diversity and inclusion.

elements.name: recognition_programs
elements.title: Are employee recognition programs effective?
elements.description: Indicate whether employee recognition programs are effective.

elements.name: culture_improvements
elements.title: Do you have any suggestions for improving the company culture?
elements.description: Provide any suggestions you have for improving the company culture.

title: Internal HR Survey for Employee Satisfaction
description: This survey aims to measure employee satisfaction with their job.
